name: Dojo Flattened
description: Removes all shadows, gradients, textures, and borders. Cannot be combined with other themes unless you manually mix and match code. This also includes the code from Dojo Showcase Fix (unedited) written by m_x which was shared by license CC BY 4.0
additional_info: Also removes corner rounding, to get it back just delete the line border-radius: 0px!important; This script will be updated once chat is available again. Code and images are by me and public domain, except the part written by m_x which is CC BY 4.0
